title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, list, delete models from Python.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration layer for Ollama models (chat, embeddings, tool-calling).

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, RAG, user auth).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper for chatting with Ollama models, history, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama completions inline like GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU/node-selector support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, streaming, embedding support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama; simple interface to chat, pull, list, delete models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration for Ollama chat & embedding generators.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: function-calling, vision, RAG, fine-tuning, Docker patterns.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-made docker-compose stacks for Ollama + Open WebUI + GPU support.

title: ollama-chem
summary: Specialized Ollama image with chemistry-aware LLMs for drug-discovery prompts.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to query local Ollama models from notes and get inline completions.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client for Ollama; lightweight, async, static binary friendly.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async/sync bindings to Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama; supports chat, embeddings, streaming, and tool calls.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Streamlit chatbot that combines Ollama with ChromaDB for private RAG.
